snippet: In 2015, the Republican State Leadership Committee — which includes secretaries of state, who are charged with ensuring fair and accurate elections — began a program to defeat liberal ballot initiatives on topics like the minimum wage, and to ...
lead_paragraph: In 2015, the Republican State Leadership Committee — which includes secretaries of state, who are charged with ensuring fair and accurate elections — began a program to defeat liberal ballot initiatives on topics like the minimum wage, and to raise money from corporations that also wanted to kill these efforts. Here is a look at the push.

headline.main: G.O.P. Secretary of State Fund-Raising and Ballot Initiative Project
